attributes.action: amend highways law to allow cyclists to treat red traffic lights as if they were give way lines if turning left
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: thus legalising an element of the common practise of Red Light Jumping (RLJ'ing) as demonstrated by cyclists across the entire country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
